title: The Christmas Present
description: A Pocket Watch Novella  All of the Pocket Watch Chronicles are are complete, stand alone stories.  Faced with an empty nest, and heartbroken, Anita Lewis is given the chance to experience Christmas in another time with the help of a mysterious old woman and a pocket watch. The gift she receives is priceless as she rediscovers the magic of Christmas in the past.
author: Ceci Giltenan
